attributes.action: Make unisured drivers fully responsible for the financial costs of any damage they cause
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All uninsured drivers, including car thieves, should be liable for any financial consequences arising from their actions.  This means any benefits they are entitled to will, in the first instance, be used to pay these debts.

It is grossly unfair for the law abiding majority to have to pay for the actions of this irresponsible minority.
